// src/pages/ChildrenMinistry.js import React from 'react'; import '../assets/styles/components-css/children-ministry.css'; // Updated CSS file path import EventCard from '../components/EventCard'; // Assuming EventCard is reusable const childrenEvents = [ { id: 1, title: 'Sincere Milk', date: '2024-10-05', description: 'A fun-filled event teaching kids about faith.', location: 'Church Hall', imageUrl: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x200', // Placeholder image }, { id: 2, title: 'Children Bible Studies', date: '2024-10-08', description: 'Weekly bible studies for children every Wednesday.', location: 'ZOOM', imageUrl: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x200', // Placeholder image }, { id: 3, title: 'Sunday Service for Kids', date: 'Every Sunday', description: 'Join us for our exciting Sunday service tailored for kids!', location: 'Church Sanctuary', imageUrl: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x200', // Placeholder image }, ]; const ChildrenMinistry = () => { return (

Children Ministry

Welcome to the Children Ministry page.

We focus on evangelizing, teaching, and discipling children to live victorious Christian lives.

Upcoming Events

{childrenEvents.map((event) => ( ))}

About Our Ministry

We strive to provide a nurturing and exciting environment for children to learn about God.

Regular Activities

  • Sunday School Classes
  • Children's Choir
  • Family Fun Days
  • Special Holiday Events

Get Involved

We welcome volunteers to help with our programs. Sign up to make a difference!

Join us in nurturing the faith of our children!

); }; export default ChildrenMinistry;
